fullText: Mary Bridget Davies captures Joplin's raspy voice and wild-child persona with uncanny precision, making this biographical musical work despite its conventional structure.
dtliExcerpt: Mary Bridget Davies captures Joplin's raspy voice and wild-child persona with uncanny precision, making this biographical musical work despite its conventional structure.
